name: 張朝陽
objective: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機 (7)感應機 (8)同步機。
schedule:
第一週:
單元主題:
I.Introduction to Machinery Principles :
1.Rotational Motion, Newton’s Law, and Powerrelationships,
2.The Magnetic Field,
3.Faraday’s Law
第二週:
單元主題:
4.Production of Induced Force on a Wire,
5.Induced Voltage on a Conductor Moving in a Magnetic Field.
II.Transformers:
1.The Ideal Transformer
第三週:
單元主題:
2.Theory of Operation of Real
3.Single-Phase Transformers
第四週:
單元主題:
4.The Equivalent Circuit of a Transformer,
5.The Per-Unit System of Measurements
第五週:
單元主題:
6.Transformer Voltage Regulation and Efficiency,
7.Transformer Taps and Voltage Regulation
第六週:
單元主題:
8.The Autotransformer,
9.Three-Phase Transformers
第七週:
單元主題:
10.Three-Phase Transformation Using Two Transformers
第八週:
單元主題:
11.Transformer Ratings and Related Problems,
12.Instrument Transformers
第九週:
單元主題:期中考試
第十週:
單元主題:
III.AC Machinery Fundamentals:
1.A Simple Loop in a Uniform Magnetic Field,
2.The Rotating Magnetic Field
第十一週:
單元主題:
3.Magnetomotive Force and Flux Distribution on AC Machines,
4.Induced Voltage in AC Machines,
5.Induced Torque in an AC Machine
第十二週:
單元主題:
6.Winding Insulation in an AC Machine,
7.AC Machine Power Flows and Losses,
8.Voltage Regulation and Speed Regulation
第十三週:
單元主題:
IV.Induction Motors:
1.Basic Induction Motor Concepts,
2.The Equivalent Circuit of an Induction Motor
第十四週:
單元主題:
3.Power and Torque in Induction Motors,
4.Induction Motor Torque–Speed Characteristics
第十五週:
單元主題:
5.Variations in Induction Motor Torque–Speed Characteristics,
6.Trends in Induction Motor Design
第十六週:
單元主題:
7.Starting Induction Motors, Speed Control of Induction Motors,
8.Solid-State Induction Motor Drives
第十七週:
單元主題:
9.Determining Circuit Model Parameters,
10.The Induction Generator,
11.Induction Motor Ratings
第十八週:
單元主題:期末考試
scorePolicy: 期中考佔30%，期末考佔40%，演算習作及隨堂問答佔30%。
materials: Electric Machinery Fundamentals , 5th Edition, Stephen J. Chapman; McGRAW-HILL , 2012年
